description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Samarinda, Indonesia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Central Samarinda Escape with Mahakam River Views, Onsite Dining & Pool
hotels.description: Stay close to the centre and enjoy easy access to popular attractions of Samarinda while experiencing impeccable hospitality and epicurean adventures. Ideally located, this hotel offers easy access to the bustling Mahakam River, the city's lifeline, and the historic Islamic Centre Samarinda. Indulge in authentic Indonesian cuisine at the hotel's restaurant, or enjoy a refreshing drink at the stylish bar. For a touch of local culture, the Samarinda Central Plaza and traditional markets are just a short stroll away. After a day of exploration, rejuvenate with a dip in the indoor swimming pool or a workout in the fitness centre.

seo.title: Hotel a Samarinda - Indonesia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Samarinda, Indonesia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
